channel.title: Death spawn (PI)
channel.description:
where can i change the place you spawn at when you die? :confused:
Thanks to whoever helps :)

item.title: Death spawn (PI)
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

[quote=“zzjimmy, post:7, topic:416185”][quote author=we rushed god link=topic=518128.msg3764715#msg3764715 date=1317153468]
Ok so go to ur source. Src>server> config.java
Next you will see something like
Start Position: XXXX
Stat position: YYYY
Change those to the coords where u want players to spawn in the game
Ok next is

Death respawn here: XXXX
Death respawn here: YYYY
Something like that ^ (if you just read near the top of config.java you will find what im talking about)
And change that to the xxxx and yyyy coords that you want them to spawn at.
Hope i helped.
[/quote]
already got it but thanks :P[/quote]
ok, no problem Mopar needs a friendly community xD

Read full topic

@smokin_flax wrote:

search for the posistion, player.java, change that, an ALSO, i suggest not putting home tele in the same place as death spawn, put the death spawn in a bank. Just a suggestion

item.title: Death spawn (PI)
item.dc:creator: @iiLovePVP iiLovePVP
item.description:
@iiLovePVP wrote:

Its in config.java

its something like this.

public static final int RESPAWN_X = xxxx; // when dead respawn here
public static final int RESPAWN_Y = yyyy;

Read full topic
